member.name: IDWriteFontSet3.GetFontSourceName
member.summary: Copies the font source name (for the specified font) into an output array.
member.param: Character array that receives the string. Call to determine the size of array to allocate.
Size of the array in characters. The size must include space for the terminating null character.
member.returns: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

member.name: IDWriteFontSet3.GetFontSourceNameLength
member.summary: Retrieves the length of the font source name for the specified font.
member.returns: The length of the font source name for the specified font.

member.name: IDWriteFontSet3.GetFontSourceType
member.summary: Retrieves the font source type of the specified font.
member.returns: The font source type of the specified font.
